description:
This is the first game that i've made using godot engine.. please don't mind bugs.. also made in 2 days for Ludum Dare 52

Controls: W/A/S/D - Move, R - Restart level

Honestly I'm just glad I could finish something in 2 days, anyways leave some feedback down below
